title.text: RFC 4463: A Media Resource Control Protocol (MRCP) Developed by Cisco, Nuance, and Speechworks

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                      S. Shanmugham
Request for Comments: 4463                           Cisco Systems, Inc.
Category: Informational                                        P. Monaco
                                                   Nuance Communications
                                                              B. Eberman
                                                        Speechworks Inc.
                                                              April 2006
A Media Resource Control Protocol (MRCP) Developed by Cisco, Nuance, and Speechworks
contents.zh-CHS: 由Cisco、Nuance和Speechworks开发的媒体资源控制协议（MRCP）
关于下段备忘
